```julia> julia_cmd = "something julia";

julia> run(`$(julia_cmd) --project -e '1+1'`)
ERROR: IOError: could not spawn `'something julia' --project -e '1+1'`: no such file or directory (ENOENT)```

text: I think you can also interpolate a vector of strings into a Cmd - just split your string

elements.text: I think you can also interpolate a vector of strings into a Cmd - just split your string

text:
```julia> a = "b c";

julia> `foo a $a d`
`foo a 'b c' d`

julia> `foo a $(split(a)) d`
`foo a b c d````
